title: ORM Query Builder
description: Create a query builder that simulates Django ORM operations to understand how they translate to SQL.
instructions: Build a QueryBuilder class that chains methods like Django's ORM and outputs equivalent SQL.

hints.text: **Hint:** Split the key on '__' to separate field name from lookup type. Use a dictionary or if/elif to map lookups (gt, contains, etc.) to SQL operators (>, LIKE, etc.).

commonMistakes.mistake: Forgetting to escape string values in SQL
commonMistakes.correction: Django ORM handles this with parameterized queries - never build raw SQL with f-strings in production
